playerTiersDesc: The coloured uisernames ye see in the bletherins mean a body's conteebutin tyre. The heicher the tyre, the mair the body haes contreebutit tae Slay throu airt, code, the community, an mair!
contribModal: <%= name %>, you awesome person! You're now a tier <%= level %> contributor for helping Slay.
contribLink: See what prizes you've earned for your contribution!
contribText: Has contributed to Slay, whether via code, art, music, writing, or other methods. To learn more, join the Aspiring Legends Guild!
contribHallText: 1-7 for normal contributors, 8 for moderators, 9 for staff. This determines which items, pets, and mounts are available. Also determines name-tag coloring. Tiers 8 and 9 are automatically given admin status.
title: Title
notGems: is in USD, not in Gems. Aka, if this number is 1, it means 4 gems. Only use this option when manually granting gems to players, don't use it when granting contributor tiers. Contrib tiers will automatically add gems.
surveysSingle: Helped Slay grow, either by filling out a survey or helping with a major testing effort. Thank you!
surveysMultiple: Helped Slay grow on <%= count %> occasions, either by filling out a survey or helping with a major testing effort. Thank you!
blurbHallPatrons: This is the Hall of Patrons, where we honor the noble adventurers who backed Slay's original Kickstarter. We thank them for helping us bring Slay to life!
blurbHallContributors: This is the Hall of Contributors, where open-source contributors to Slay are honored. Whether through code, art, music, writing, or even just helpfulness, they have earned gems, exclusive equipment, and prestigious titles. You can contribute to Slay, too! Find out more here.
